posts.description: Open Source Windows is a simple list of the best free and open source software for Windows. posts.description: In my code journeys and programming adventures I’ve encountered many strange foes, and even stranger allies. I’ve identified at least five different kinds of code warriors, some make for wonderful comrades in arms, while others seem to foil my every plan.

posts.caption: stevenbenner.com
posts.description: How do you define a real programmer? There are many facets that you can use to judge someone’s skill as a programmer: ability, experience, enthusiasm, dedication, etc. But I recently read an article by RethinkDB blogger Slava, and he boils all of these points down to one item, memorization. posts.message: I have a question to our PHP Developers here :) I'm sending Emails from php mail() and it's working good on my local but in our dedicated server is not working :S ... is there anyway i can include another script and use it to send mails?
